statements: SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment_date FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_reason FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE AND appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(appointment_date) AS last_appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, reminder_sent FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < NOW();
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT appointment_date, reminder_sent FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT reminder_message, reminder_datetime FROM reminders WHERE reminder_status = TRUE;

SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '09876543-abdc-12e2-1b9c-1234567890ef';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%' AND patient_address LIKE '%Street';

SELECT reminders.reminder_id, reminders.reminder_datetime, appointments.appointment_date FROM reminders JOIN appointments ON reminders.appointment_id = appointments.appointment_id WHERE reminders.reminder_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE reminder_status = 'pending' ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors;

SELECT patient_name, patient_phone_number, patient_email FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%Room%' AND sensor_name LIKE 'Temp%';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reminder_date ASC, reminder_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type, appointment_status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology' AND doctor_email LIKE '%@hospital.com';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_content FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date > NOW() ORDER BY reminder_date;
